get.description: Returns list of customers according to specified params.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Filter by customer update date. If specified return customers updated after specified time.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search filter. Search customers by name, phone or bonus card number.

parameters.name: filter[createdBy]
parameters.description: Filter by worker who registered customer.

parameters.name: filter[create][from]
parameters.description: Filter by customer registration date (start date).

parameters.name: filter[create][to]
parameters.description: Filter by customer registration date (end date).

parameters.name: filter[buy][from]
parameters.description: Filter by date of buys of customers (start date).

parameters.name: filter[buy][to]
parameters.description: Filter by date of buys of customers (end date).

parameters.name: filter[notBuy][from]
parameters.description: Filter buy customers who does not made any orders (start date)

parameters.name: filter[notBuy][to]
parameters.description: Filter buy customers who does not made any orders (end date)

parameters.name: filter[celebrations]
parameters.description: Filter by customer celebrations (comma separated array of celebration IDS).

parameters.name: filter[preferences]
parameters.description: Filter by customer preferences (comma separated array of preference IDS).

parameters.name: filter[sources]
parameters.description: Filter by customer sources (comma separated array of customer source IDS).

parameters.name: filter[onlyActive]
parameters.description: Filter by active custom preferences (show deleted or not).

parameters.name: filter[revision]
parameters.description: Filter by customer preferences revision (min value).

parameters.name: filter[disabled]
parameters.description: Filter by active custom preferences (show deleted or not).

parameters.name: filter[revision]
parameters.description: Filter by customer preferences revision (min value).

parameters.name: filter[dataSource]
parameters.description: Data source for retrieving data. Null - api, both - api and catalog

parameters.name: filter[sold][from]
parameters.description: Filter by sold items from date

parameters.name: filter[sold][to]
parameters.description: Filter by sold items to date

parameters.name: filter[available]
parameters.description: Return only items which have entries in InventItemLocationSumTrans and quantity > 0. Cannot be used simultaneously with nonzeroBalances filter

parameters.name: filter[balances][nonzero]
parameters.description: Filter by nonzero balances on warehouse. False - everything, true - everything except zero balances. Cannot be used simultaneously with available filter

parameters.name: filter[hasTransactions]
parameters.description: Return only items which have transactions

parameters.name: filter[hasActivePrices]
parameters.description: Return only items which have active price at any store or by specified store

parameters.name: public
parameters.description: Return only items which have "public" flag is enabled

parameters.name: filter[exclude][journal]
parameters.description: Exclude inventory items from specified journal

ErrorSource.description: An object containing references to the source of the error

pointer.description: A JSON Pointer [RFC6901] to the associated entity in the request document

parameter.description: A string indicating which URI query parameter caused the error

id.description: A unique identifier for this particular occurrence of the problem

status.description: The HTTP status code applicable to this problem, expressed as a string value

code.description: An application-specific error code, expressed as a string value

title.description:
A short, human-readable summary of the problem that SHOULD NOT change from occurrence to occurrence of 
the problem, except for purposes of localization."

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem

deleted.description: Flag which shows that source was deleted.
Flag which shows that preference was deleted

accessToken.description: Access token that should be used for API requests

refreshToken.description: Refresh token that should be used to retrieve new access token.

isPerson.description: Flag which indicates that the client is an individual

currentPoints.description: Quantity of points customer have at the moment
